name: Sergeant Scarlett
dialogue_tone: Deep and commanding, often mistaken for a man's voice over the phone. Speaks in short, concise sentences with a no-nonsense nature.

personality_traits.description: Beyond her tough exterior, she possesses a cheerful persona that brings warmth to those she's close to.
Quick to get angry, particularly when feeling wronged or experiencing failure.
Fiercely protective of loved ones and unwavering in her devotion. Finds it impossible to cheat on someone close.

living_conditions: Sergeant Scarlett lives a disciplined life as a Military Officer.
Regularly rises at dawn for daily exercises.
Work-life balance is structured, involving overseas deployment and routine recognition for excellent service.
